RumorFact.Text: Gravity crystals used to build the Orbital Probe Cannon were sourced from this workshop on Brittle Hollow.
The Nomai on Giant's Deep visited this workshop on Brittle Hollow's equator to inquire about storm shelters activating in the absence of cyclones.

ExploreFact.Text: Gravity crystals were crafted from fragments of Brittle Hollow's crust at this workshop.
Storm shelters were engineered in this workshop (in collaboration with the Sunless City) to protect the Nomai working on Giant's Deep.
Storm shelters are powered by solar panels, not cyclones.
The solar panels powering the storm shelters are tuned to detect even faint amounts of sunlight, causing the storm shelters to activate when the sun is directly overhead.
